    List(IApplicationOperations, ApplicationListOptions)
    List(IApplicationOperations, ApplicationListOptions)

    Lists all of the applications available in the specified account.

    public static Rest.Azure.IPage<ApplicationSummary> List(this IApplicationOperations operations, ApplicationListOptions applicationListOptions = null)<ExtensionAttribute>
Public Shared Function List(operations As IApplicationOperations, applicationListOptions As ApplicationListOptions = Nothing) As Rest.Azure.IPage(Of ApplicationSummary)

    Parameters

    • operations
      IApplicationOperations
      IApplicationOperations

      The operations group for this extension method.

    • applicationListOptions
      ApplicationListOptions
      ApplicationListOptions

      Additional parameters for the operation

    Returns

    • Microsoft.Rest.Azure.IPage<ApplicationSummary>
      Microsoft.Rest.Azure.IPage(Of ApplicationSummary)

    Remarks

    This operation returns only applications and versions that are available for use on compute nodes; that is, that can be used in an application package reference. For administrator information about applications and versions that are not yet available to compute nodes, use the Azure portal or the Azure Resource Manager API.
